sentences.en: A Z - axial moving cylinder is vertically arranged in front of the clamp.
sentences.cn: 夹具前方竖立有Z轴向移动气缸.

sentences.en: All he could do was to cast sidelong glances of disapproval and clamp his lips together.
sentences.cn: 他只能从眼角边显出点不满的神气,而把嘴闭得紧紧的.

sentences.en: Banking regulators failed to clamp down until earlier this month.
sentences.cn: 银行监管机构直到本月初才开始严格管制。

sentences.en: Clamp one end of the plank to the edge of the table.
sentences.cn: 把厚木板的一端用夹具固定在桌子的边上。

sentences.en: Clamp the two pieces of wood together until the glue dries.
sentences.cn: 用夹钳把两块木板夹紧,等胶水干了再松开.

sentences.en: Clamp these two pieces of wood together.
sentences.cn: 把两根木头钳紧.

sentences.en: clamping down on environment polluters.
sentences.cn: 对环境污染者实施管制

sentences.en: Courts in Scotland have ruled it illegal to clamp a car parked on private ground and then to demand a fine.
sentences.cn: 苏格兰法院裁定，将停在私人地界上的车辆上夹钳并索要罚款的行为是违法的。

sentences.en: Creed opened his mouth to speak, then clamped it shut .
sentences.cn: 克里德张口欲言，忽又闭口不说了。

sentences.en: Excess clamp puts more abuse than is necessary on the press.
sentences.cn: 过量的锁模力,对设备是一种“虐待”.

sentences.en: He returned, only to discover his car had been clamped.
sentences.cn: 他回来了，不料发现自己的汽车被上了夹钳。

sentences.en: In the school shop it is used for projects like hammer heads and clamp parts.
sentences.cn: 在校办工厂里由它制作锤头和夹具之类的产品.

sentences.en: Its lower end is anchored at the erection truss by a clamp.
sentences.cn: 其下端由一夹钳锚定在施工桁梁上.

sentences.en: Many openers have a magnet or set of clamps to grip the open lid.
sentences.cn: 许多开启器是用磁铁或夹具来夹紧要开启的盖子。

sentences.en: She clamped her hands over her ears.
sentences.cn: 她用手紧紧地捂住耳朵。

sentences.en: Somebody forgot to bring along the U-bolts to clamp the microphones to the pole.
sentences.cn: 有人忘了带把麦克风固定在支架上的U形螺栓。

sentences.en: The contact area between clamp and terminal is either silver or copper.
sentences.cn: 夹头和电极之间的接触面是银的或铜的.

sentences.en: The mayor had become ineffectual in the struggle to clamp down on drugs.
sentences.cn: 市长打击毒品的努力未见成效。

sentences.en: The team manager has been quick to clamp down on the merest hint of complacency.
sentences.cn: 球队主教练很快就消除了自满的小苗头。

sentences.en: They clamp down on pickpockets.
sentences.cn: 他们严禁扒窃.

phrases.tran_cn: 变得更严厉或强制；强加控制
软管夹，软管夹子；软管卡

trans.tran_en: a piece of equipment for holding things together
to put a clamp on the wheel of a car so that the car cannot be driven away. This is usually done because the car is illegally parked.

trans.tran_cn: 夹住，固定，紧紧抓住，给（车辆）上夹钳
trans.tran_en: to put or hold something in a position so that it cannot move
to put or hold something in a position so that it cannot move
